choose_language: Choose your preferred language to use the app
profile_update_error: An error occurred while updating the profile. Please try again.
check_on_child_msg: Attention, mom, time to check on your child.
open_camera_msg: Open the camera to see what your child is doing right now.
ask_about_day_msg: Ask your child how they're feeling and how their day went.
health_check_msg: Check if your child is healthy or feeling unwell.
privacy_description: We value your privacy and ensure your personal data is protected. This application collects only necessary information to provide the best experience. All sensitive data, such as your location or heart rate, is securely stored and not shared with third parties.
rights_description:
You can request access to your data.
You can request deletion of your account and all related data.
You can opt out of notifications or tracking features.
contact_us: For more information, contact us through the Help & Support section.
contact_instruction: If you have any questions or need help using the app, feel free to contact us through the following methods:
faq_contact: You can access the FAQ section or contact us directly. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
